fr.xephi.authme.permission.handlers

Interface PermissionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BPermissionsHandler, LuckPermsHandler, PermissionsExHandler, VaultHandler, ZPermissionsHandler

    public interface PermissionHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add the permission group of a player, if supported.
      Collection<String> getGroups(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)

    • Method Detail

      • addToGroup

        boolean addToGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                   String group)
        Add the permission group of a player, if supported.
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        group - The name of the group.
        Returns:
        True if succeed, false otherwise. False is also returned if this feature isn't supported for the current permissions system.

      • hasGroupSupport

        boolean hasGroupSupport()
        Check whether the current permissions system has group support. If no permissions system is hooked, false will be returned.
        Returns:
        True if the current permissions system supports groups, false otherwise.

      • hasPermissionOffline

        boolean hasPermissionOffline(String name,
                             PermissionNode node)
        Check if a player has permission by their name. Used to check an offline player's permission.
        Parameters:
        name - The player's name.
        node - The permission node.
        Returns:
        True if the player has permission.

      • isInGroup

        default boolean isInGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                          String group)
        Check whether the player is in the specified group.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        group - The group name.
        Returns:
        True if the player is in the specified group, false otherwise. False is also returned if groups aren't supported by the used permissions system.

      • removeFromGroup

        boolean removeFromGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                        String group)
        Remove the permission group of a player, if supported.
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        group - The name of the group.
        Returns:
        True if succeed, false otherwise. False is also returned if this feature isn't supported for the current permissions system.

      • setGroup

        boolean setGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player,
                 String group)
        Set the permission group of a player, if supported. This clears the current groups of the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        group - The name of the group.
        Returns:
        True if succeed, false otherwise. False is also returned if this feature isn't supported for the current permissions system.

      • getGroups

        Collection<String> getGroups(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
        Get the permission groups of a player, if available.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        Returns:
        Permission groups, or an empty list if this feature is not supported.

      • getPrimaryGroup

        default String getPrimaryGroup(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
        Get the primary group of a player, if available.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        Returns:
        The name of the primary permission group. Or null.

      • getPermissionSystem

        PermissionsSystemType getPermissionSystem()
        Get the permission system that is being used.
        Returns:
        The permission system.

      • loadUserData

        default void loadUserData(UUID uuid)
                   throws PermissionLoadUserException
        Throws:
        PermissionLoadUserException
